trans-unit.source: Provides a means of creating and formatting a valid Web Services Description Language (WSDL) document file, complete with appropriate namespaces, elements, and attributes, for describing an XML Web service.
This class cannot be inherited.

Instances of this class can be created with either the `new` keyword or the static <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription.Read%2A> method, which parses a WSDL file and assigns its values to appropriate members of the class.
WSDL is an XML-based language for describing XML Web services.
The <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription> class corresponds to the root element, `definitions`, of a WSDL file.
For more information about WSDL, see the specification at http://www.w3.org/TR/wsdl/.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription"></xref> class.
Gets the collection of <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.Binding"></xref> elements contained in the <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription"></xref>.

The <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.BindingCollection> returned by this property corresponds to the list of `binding` elements enclosed by the Web Services Description Language (WSDL) `definitions` root element.
For more information about WSDL, see the specification at http://www.w3.org/TR/wsdl/.
A collection of binding elements contained in the service description.
Gets a value that indicates whether an <xref href="System.Xml.XmlReader"></xref> represents a valid Web Services Description Language (WSDL) file that can be parsed.
An <xref href="System.Xml.XmlReader"></xref>
`true` if the <xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer"></xref> can recognize the node on which the <xref href="System.Xml.XmlReader"></xref> is positioned; otherwise `false`.
Gets the collection of extensibility elements contained in the <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription"></xref>.
The collection of extensibility elements contained in the <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription"></xref>.
Gets the collection of <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.Import"></xref> elements contained in the <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription"></xref>.

The <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.ImportCollection> returned by this property corresponds to the list of `import` elements enclosed by the Web Services Description Language (WSDL) `definitions` root element.
For more information about WSDL, see the specification at http://www.w3.org/TR/wsdl/.
A collection of import elements contained in the service description.
Gets the collection of <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.Message"></xref> elements contained in the <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription"></xref>.

The <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.MessageCollection> returned by this property corresponds to the list of `message` elements enclosed by the Web Services Description Language (WSDL) `definitions` root element.
For more information about WSDL, see the specification at http://www.w3.org/TR/wsdl/.
A collection of message elements contained in the service description.
The XML namespace in which the <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription"></xref> class is defined ("http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/").
This field is constant.
Gets the collection of <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.PortType"></xref> elements contained in the <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription"></xref>.

The <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.PortTypeCollection> returned by this property corresponds to the list of `portType` elements enclosed by the Web Services Description Language (WSDL) `definitions` root element.
For more information about WSDL, see the specification at http://www.w3.org/TR/wsdl/.
A collection of <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.PortType"></xref> elements contained in the <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription"></xref>.
Initializes an instance of the <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription"></xref> class by directly loading the XML from an <xref href="System.Xml.XmlReader"></xref>.
An <xref href="System.Xml.XmlReader"></xref>, passed by reference, which contains the XML data to be read.

A <xref href="System.Boolean"></xref> that indicates whether the XML should be validated against the schema specified by <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription.Schema"></xref>.
An instance of the <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription"></xref>.
Initializes an instance of a <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription"></xref> object by directly loading the XML from the specified file.
The path to the file to be read.

A <xref href="System.Boolean"></xref> that indicates whether the XML should be validated against the schema specified by <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription.Schema"></xref>.
An instance of the <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription"></xref>.
Initializes an instance of the <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription"></xref> class by directly loading the XML from a <xref href="System.IO.Stream"></xref> instance.
A <xref href="System.IO.Stream"></xref>, passed by reference, which contains the bytes to be read.

A <xref href="System.Boolean"></xref> that indicates whether the XML should be validated against the schema specified by <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription.Schema"></xref>.
An instance of the <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription"></xref>.
Initializes an instance of the <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription"></xref> class by directly loading the XML from a <xref href="System.IO.TextReader"></xref>.

A <xref href="System.Boolean"></xref> that indicates whether the XML should be validated against the schema specified by <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription.Schema"></xref>.
An instance of the <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription"></xref>.
Initializes an instance of a <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription"></xref> object by directly loading the XML from the specified file.
The path to the file to be read.
An instance of the <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription"></xref>.
Initializes an instance of the <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription"></xref> class by directly loading the XML from a <xref href="System.IO.TextReader"></xref>.
A <xref href="System.IO.TextReader"></xref> instance, passed by reference, which contains the text to be read.
An instance of the <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription"></xref>.
Initializes an instance of the <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription"></xref> class by directly loading the XML from a <xref href="System.IO.Stream"></xref> instance.
A <xref href="System.IO.Stream"></xref>, passed by reference, which contains the bytes to be read.
An instance of the <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription"></xref>.
Initializes an instance of the <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription"></xref> class by directly loading the XML from an <xref href="System.Xml.XmlReader"></xref>.
An <xref href="System.Xml.XmlReader"></xref>, passed by reference, which contains the XML data to be read.
An instance of the <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription"></xref>.
Gets or sets the URL of the XML Web service to which the <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription"></xref> instance applies.
The URL of the XML Web service.
The default value is an empty string ("").
Gets the schema associated with this <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription"></xref>.
The schema associated with this <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription"></xref>.

Gets the XML serializer used to serialize and deserialize between a <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription"></xref> object and a Web Services Description Language (WSDL) document.
The XML serializer can be customized using classes derived from the abstract <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescriptionFormatExtension> class.
These classes are specified in a configuration file using the `serviceDescriptionFormatExtensionTypes` element and its child `add` element.
The configuration can be applied to an ASP.NET Web application that publishes a Web service.
The XML serializer used to serialize and deserialize between a <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription"></xref> object and a Web Services Description Language (WSDL) document.
Gets the <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescriptionCollection"></xref> instance of which the <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription"></xref> is a member.
A collection of service description.
The <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription"></xref> has not been assigned to a parent collection.
Gets the collection of <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.Service"></xref> instances contained in the <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription"></xref>.

The <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceCollection> returned by this property corresponds to the list of `service` elements enclosed by the Web Services Description Language (WSDL) `definitions` root element.
For more information about WSDL, see the specification at http://www.w3.org/TR/wsdl/.
A collection of service instances contained in the service description.
Gets or sets the XML `targetNamespace` attribute of the `descriptions` tag enclosing a Web Services Description Language (WSDL) file.
The URL of the XML Web service described by the <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription"></xref>.
Gets or sets the <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.Types"></xref> contained by the <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription"></xref>.

The <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.Types> instance returned by this property corresponds to the list of `types` elements enclosed by the Web Services Description Language (WSDL) `definitions` root element.
For more information about WSDL, see the specification at http://www.w3.org/TR/wsdl/.
A <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.Types"></xref> instance that represents the data types of both the parameters and return values of the methods exposed by the XML Web service.
Gets a that contains any validation warnings that were generated during a call to , , , or with the validate parameter set to `true`.
A that contains any validation warnings that were generated during a call to , , , or with the validate parameter set to `true`.
Writes out the <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription"></xref> as a Web Services Description Language (WSDL) file to the specified path.
The path to which the WSDL file is written.
Writes out the <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription"></xref> to the specified <xref href="System.IO.Stream"></xref>.
A <xref href="System.IO.Stream"></xref>, passed by reference, which contains the Web Services Description Language (WSDL) file produced.
Writes out the <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription"></xref> as a Web Services Description Language (WSDL) file to the <xref href="System.IO.TextWriter"></xref>.
A <xref href="System.IO.TextWriter"></xref> that contains the WSDL file produced.
Writes out the <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription"></xref> to the <xref href="System.Xml.XmlWriter"></xref> as a Web Services Description Language (WSDL) file.
An <xref href="System.Xml.XmlWriter"></xref>, passed by reference, which contains the WSDL file produced.
